product_name: Topeak RX BeamRack with Side Frame - V-Type
long_description: This Topeak seatpost-mounted, quick-release rack attaches easily, and its compact size makes it ideal for road bikes. This QuickTrackTM system is compatible with RX-series TrunkBagsTM.
short_description: This Topeak seatpost-mounted, quick-release rack attaches easily, and its compact size makes it ideal for road bikes. This QuickTrackTM system is compatible with RX-series TrunkBagsTM.
